name: Food West Africa
content: Be a part of West Africa's most high-impact B2B food and beverage trade show 4000+ Attendees. 100+ Exhibitors. 50+ Free Seminars. Now in its 4th year, Food West Africa is the region's leading B2B food and beverage trade show. Featuring free seminars on the hottest F&B topics and a buzzing expo floor, it provides an unrivalled platform for networking, technology transfer and knowledge sharing in the F&B market. Co-located with Agra Innovate West Africa. The Nigerian wholesale and retail industry which accounts for 16.7% of GDP remains a lucrative market. Food West Africa brings together wholesalers, traders, importers, distributors and supermarket chains. Co-located with Agra Innovate West Africa and now in its 4th successful year, the Food West Africa exhibition provides a unique platform for global suppliers to showcase their F&B products, technology and services to thousands of decision makers from the West African food and drink industry. Capitalize on the best opportunity to discuss business, share information, discover the latest F&B trends and discover new products launched into the market.
